1. Get HTML/CSS code for a linktree and edit it (there's one in my github)

@esiattorney ~90% correct

Can't get addresses or address balances. 

There's a few edge cases where we can constrain the amount being sent but that's it (if we know the TXOs being spent).

Successfully executing an EAE attack means you have partial transaction history (but not amounts).
